sentences.en: A BMI greater than 30 is considered obese.
sentences.cn: 体重指数超过30则被认为是肥胖。

sentences.en: Obese people tend to have higher blood pressure than lean people.
sentences.cn: 肥胖的人往往比瘦人血压高。

sentences.en: Height-weight tables give an approximate guideline as to whether one is simply overweight or has passed into the obese stage.
sentences.cn: 身高-体重表给出了一个大致的指南，来判断一个人是单纯超重还是已经进入肥胖阶段。
